code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSwipeable}from'react-swipeable';import'./PlayerCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PlayerCard=_ref=>{let{name,totalBuyIn,cashOut,net,onEditBuyIn,onEditCashOut,onDelete,formatter}=_ref;const handleActionClick=(e,action)=>{e.stopPropagation();action();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"player-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"player-name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-amounts",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"net-amount",style:{color:net>=0?'#4caf50':'#f44336'},children:formatter.format(net)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"buyin-amount",children:[formatter.format(totalBuyIn)," in \u2022 ",formatter.format(cashOut||0)," out"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"action-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn cashout-btn",onClick:e=>handleActionClick(e,onEditCashOut),"aria-label":"Record cash out",children:"\uD83D\uDCB5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"action-label",children:"Cash Out"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"action-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn edit-btn",onClick:e=>handleActionClick(e,onEditBuyIn),"aria-label":"Edit player",children:"\u270F\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"action-label",children:"Edit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"action-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn delete-btn",onClick:e=>handleActionClick(e,onDelete),"aria-label":"Delete player",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"action-label",children:"Delete"})]})]})]})});};export default PlayerCard;
